description: A UN official speaks of "absolute carnage" after visiting a hospital with many injured in central Gaza.
maintext: "When I say that there were strikes again today and casualties arriving, some of those strikes were in areas that people have been told to evacuate to, which, again goes back to the refrain that, I think, I am so sick of saying: that there is no safe place in Gaza," she said.
title: Israel Gaza war: UN says no let-up in Israeli air strikes in Gaza
